biotools.summary:
Improving locus recovery from the Angiosperms353 probe set.

Bioinformatic sequence recovery for universal target-capture bait kits can be substantially improved by appropriate tailoring of target files to the group under study.

mega353.fasta A target file for use with target enrichment datasets captured using the Angiosperms353 bait kit.

bioschemas.name: New targets
